description: For a chocolate twist on the old-fashioned, try this chocolate-infused rye whiskey. It's not nearly as sweet as other chocolate drinks, but it's still well-balanced and may change your mind about what chocolate can do in cocktails.Infuse Time: 36 hrs
name: Cocoa Old-Fashioned

recipeInstructions.name: Fill an infusion jar halfway with rye whiskey and cacao nibs.
recipeInstructions.text: Fill an infusion jar halfway with rye whiskey and cacao nibs.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake well and set aside for 3 days or until you have a nice and balanced flavor.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake well and set aside for 3 days or until you have a nice and balanced flavor.

recipeInstructions.name: When the flavor intensity is to your liking, strain out the nibs and rebottle the whiskey. It can be stored in the same manner as any other whiskey.

recipeInstructions.name: Add one brandied cherry and half an orange slice to an old-fashioned glass, along with the demerara syrup and mole bitters. Muddle thoroughly.

recipeInstructions.name: Fill the glass halfway with ice and top it with the cocoa-infused whiskey

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with the remaining cherry and orange slice, as well as orange zest, if desired.
